title: Rickettsia helvetica in C3H/HeN mice: A model for studying pathogen-host interactions

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Apolline Maitre, Lourdes Mateos-Hernandez, Tal Azagi, Angélique Foucault-Simonin, Sabine Rakotobe, Zbigniew Zając, Pavle Banović, Stefania Porcelli, Aurélie Heckmann, Clémence Galon, Hein Sprong, Sara Moutailler, Alejandro Cabezas-Cruz, Andrea C. Fogaça
